title: No One Has Time For That
description: Grady Sachs is a mild-mannered, unsuspecting, everyman. In fact, Grady Sachs has spent most of his life slipping through the cracks. Forgettable and painfully average, but that's they way he'd like it. He was used to it. Nothing ever happens to Grady Sachs.Until one day...
author: M. von Lindenberg
